Larry this may be a bit late but it is one hobby I absolutely love!

I play=
 games of all kinds and love wargames and games about history.

DBA is a go=
od set of rules and you can depict some of the Japanese
battles with that. =
   You can search for DeBellis Antiquatis DBA--there is a huge following of=
 those rules.

We sometimes play Shogun by Milton Bradley which is a five p=
layer
game, loosely based on the Sengoku Jidai or warring states period
in =
Japan.

Drop me an Email if you want more info on rules etc.

I co-founded =
a games group here in Japan called JIGG: Japan`s
International Gamers Guild=
.

Kev
